description: Moodle Dev Pro hooks for code standards and accessibility validation

hooks.command:
#!/bin/bash
echo 'üîç Running pre-commit checks...'
if [ -f 'version.php' ]; then
  if command -v vendor/bin/phpcs &> /dev/null; then
    echo '  ‚Üí Running PSR-12/Moodle code standards check...'
    vendor/bin/phpcs --standard=moodle . --extensions=php || {
      echo '‚ùå Code standards violations detected!'
      exit 2
    }
    echo '  ‚úì Code standards: PASSED'
  fi
fi
echo '‚úÖ Pre-commit checks completed'
exit 0
